src_original: adhasthātpādatalayoścakre jāte sahasrāre sanābhike sanemike sarvākāraparipūrṇe /
tgt_original: 二者、足下千輻輞輪，輪相具足；

src_original: dīrghāṅgulimaṃhāpuruṣaḥ /  mṛdutaruṇapāṇipādaḥ /
tgt_original: 三者、手足指長勝於餘人； 四者、手足柔軟勝餘身分；

src_original: jālapāṇipādaḥ /  ucchaṅgacaraṇaḥ /  eṇeyajaṅghaḥ /
tgt_original: 五者、足跟廣具足滿好； 六者、手足指合縵網勝於餘人；

src_original: kośagatavastiguhyaḥ /  nyogradhaparimaṇḍalaḥ /  ūrdhvāṅgaromā /
tgt_original: 十者、陰藏相，如馬王、象王； 十一者、身縱廣等，如尼俱盧樹；

src_original: ekaikaromā /  ekaikamasya romakūpe jātaṃ nīlaṃ kuṇḍalakajātaṃ pradakṣiṇāvartam /
tgt_original: 十二者、一一孔一毛生，色青、柔軟、右旋；

src_original: paravihiṃsāmadattādānañca prahāya gurūṇāṃ cābhivādanavandana-pratyutthānāñjali-sāmīcī-karma  kṛtvā pareṣāṃ manastuṣṭipriyabhogāhrasvīkaraṇān nihatamānatvācca dīrghāṅgulitvaṃ
tgt_original: 離殺生業因緣故，得長指相。 離不與取業因緣故，得足跟滿相。

src_original: mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaṃ pratilabhate /  yaiśca tribhiḥ karmabhiretāni trīṇi mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni nirdiṣṭāni taireva sarvaiḥ samastairāyatapādapārṣṇitvaṃ pratilabhate /  tatra trayāṇāmapi lakṣaṇānāṃ saṃniśrayatvāt caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhirgurūn saṃgṛhya jālapāṇipādatāṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 以四攝法攝眾生業因緣故，得手足縵網相。

src_original: gurūṇāmeva cābhyaṅgodvartana-snānācchādanāni dattvā mṛdutaruṇapāṇipādatāṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 以上妙衣服、飲食、臥具供養尊長業因緣故，得手足柔軟相。

src_original: kuśaladharmāsaṃtuṣṭyā uttarottarān kuśalāndharmānvardha yitvā ucchaṅgacaraṇatāṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 修福轉增業因緣故，得足趺高相、一一孔一毛生相、毛上向相。

src_original: yathāvaddharmānudgṛhya paryavāpya pareṣāṃ ca deśayitvā dautyañca samyak pareṣāṃ kṛtvā aiṇeyajaṅghatāṃ pratilabhate /  anupūrveṇa dharmasamādānena netrīvartamānatvātpāpakaṃ kāyavāṅgamanaḥkarma saṃyamayya /
tgt_original: 如法遣使為福和合因緣，及速疾誨人故，得妙踹相，如伊泥延鹿王。

src_original: tatrānavanataḥ glāneṣu ca glānopasthānaṃ kṛtvā bhaiṣajyañca dattvā vyādhyanavanatocchrayaṇān mātrāśī ca kāmeṣvanavanataḥ anavanatakāyatāṃ pratilabhate
tgt_original: 如法淨物布施，不惱受者故，得平立手過膝相、方身相，如尼拘盧陀樹。

src_original: parairnirvāsitān sattvān dharmeṇa samena saṃhṛtya hrīmānapatrāpī vastrapradaśca koṣagatavastiguhyatāṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 多修慚愧及斷邪婬，以房舍、衣服、覆蓋之物用布施故，得陰藏相如馬王。

src_original: svayaṃ kuśalamīmāṃsakaḥ paṇḍitavijña-sevī sūkṣmārthacintakaḥ gurūṇāṃ sthānaśodhakaḥ
tgt_original: 常好問義，供給所尊及善人故，得肌皮細軟相。

src_original: prabhūtenotsadena viśadenānnapānena mahājanakāyaṃ saṃtarpayitvā saptotsadakāyatāṃ pratilabhate /  sattvānāmutpannotpanneṣu dharmeṣu karaṇīyeṣu prāmukhyenāvasthitaḥ /
tgt_original: 恭敬尊長、迎逆侍送故，得身體直廣相。 布施具足充滿故，得七處滿相。

src_original: nāhaṃ mānī na ca niṣṭhuraḥ /  ahitāñca sattvānā nivārayitā tāḍitā hitāhite ca sanniyojayitā siṃhapūrvārdhakāyatāṃ pratilabhate siṃhavatsattvārtheṣu parākramaśīlatvāt /  yenaiva ca karmaṇā dīrghāṅgulitvaṃ pratilabhate tenaiva bṛhadṛjugātratāṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 一切捨施無所遺惜故，得方頰車相。

src_original: mitrabhedakarīṃ piśunāṃ vācaṃ prahāya bhinnānāñca sattvānāṃ sāmagrīṃ kṛtvā catvāriṃśad dantatāṃ samāviraladantatāñca pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 離兩舌故，得四十齒相、齒齊相、齒密相。

src_original: kāmāvacarīṃ maitrīṃ bhāvayitvā dharmārthacintakaḥ suśukladantatāṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 常修行慈、好思惟故，得白牙無喻相。

src_original: svasutavat-sattvānsaṃrakṣya śrāddhaścānukampakaśca bhaiṣajyapradaśca [prasannaśca] rasarasāgratāṃ pratilabhate dharmarasānupradānāddharmarasāsvādanāt pranaṣṭarasaviśodhanācca /  pañca śikṣāpadāni prāṇātipātaviratyādīni svayañca samādāya saṃrakṣya parāṃśca teṣveva  samādāpayitvā karuṇācittatāmupādāya mahatī dharmasamādāne pratipannatvāduṣṇīṣaśiraskatāñca
tgt_original: 美食布施、不惱受者故，得味中最上味相。

src_original: prabhūta-tanujihvatāṃ ca pratilabhate /  satyavāditayā priyavāditayā kāladharmavāditayā ca brahmasvaratāṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 離惡口故，得梵聲相。

src_original: kṛtsnaṃ jaganmaitreṇa cetasā 'nukampya mātṛvatpitṛvadabhinīlanetratāṃ gopakṣmanetratāñca pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 善心好眼視眾生故，得眼𥇒紺青相、眼𥇒如牛王相。 禮敬所尊及自持戒、以戒教人故，得肉髻相。

src_original: guṇavatāṃ tu bhūtasya varṇasya hartāṃ varṇavādī bhruvormadhye ūrṇāṃ pratilabhate śvetāṃ śaṃkhanibhāṃ pradakṣiṇāvartām /
tgt_original: 所應讚歎者而讚歎故，得眉間白毛相。
